name: smartQforAlexa
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart q.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
smartQ is a visual ticket board for workflow management and team collaboration based on Kanban.

smartQ allows you to easily distribute work, track its progress and collaborate with your team online. smartQ can track tasks, issues, tickets — it is customizable to fit any workflow. 

smartQ account required. To open one and find our more about smartQ — visit www.getsmartQ.com.
